alert.note: Alert for Brown; Keya Paha; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 5:08AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Rock, northern Brown and south central Keya Paha Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 507 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ainsworth, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ainsworth, Bassett, Long Pine, Newport, Johnstown, Keller Park State Recreation Area, Bobcat State Wildlife Management Area, Pony Lake, Pine Glen State Wildlife Refuge, Antelope Peak and Meadville. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 170 and 208. Highway 20 between mile markers 225 and 274. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
